lines: 1. Omonene ng'ang' Are gocha,'Banto bateba;Ng'enang'eni chiarimire,Nebe ogokia kwe rituko.
Ee neb'gokia kwe rituko!Ee nebi'Ogokia kwe rituko!'Botuko mboere, rituko richiche;Ee neb'ogokia Kwe rituko.
2. Ebimanyererio biabeire,Risase n'omotienyi;'Kurat'as'abanto bonsi,Ogocha kw'Omonene ng'ang'e Kore.
4. Genda bwango as' ebinchera,N'epar'enene bo;Ranger'ebirema, 'meuko,Babe ang'ase rituk'erio.
